sentences.english: Bacon still remains one of the top movie stars in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 而貝肯仍舊是好萊塢數一數二的電影明星。

sentences.english: He flew into a rage, but was still too lazy to work.
sentences.chinese: 他氣壞了，但仍舊好喫懶做。

sentences.english: Still got that Derringer in your bustle?
sentences.chinese: 架仍舊還有那根支撐條嗎？

sentences.english: Diamonds in Liberia are still traded to support wars.
sentences.chinese: 賴比瑞亞的鑽石仍舊被拿去販賣用來支持戰爭。

sentences.english: The tea, though freshly brewed, still tastes thick and stale.
sentences.chinese: 新沏的茶水喝起來卻仍舊厚重滯澀。

sentences.english: Write dull eyes still staring at the dark night to close the.
sentences.chinese: 寫寫乏味了雙眼仍舊盯着漆黑的夜不肯合上。

sentences.english: Sewage systems continue to overflow, forcing many beaches to close.
sentences.chinese: 污水系統仍舊不堪重負，導致許多湖灘被迫關閉。

sentences.english: You were still at your optometrist appointment.
sentences.chinese: 你仍舊在你驗光師約見的地方。

sentences.english: And still. Harry hadn"t asked Cho to the ball."
sentences.chinese: 哈利仍舊沒有開口邀請秋去舞會。

sentences.english: We had more time but not enough.
sentences.chinese: 我們有許多時間，但仍舊不夠。

sentences.english: I think back over the compendium of knowledge that exists there, and it still takes my breath away.
sentences.chinese: 現在回想起存於其中的知識概要，仍舊令我爲之傾倒。

sentences.english: I still can't believe you didn't tell us about it, " said Ron grumpily ."
sentences.chinese: 你竟然不告訴我們有關計時器的事，我仍舊不能相信。

sentences.english: The proles, it suddenly occurred to him, had remained in this condition.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到，無產者仍舊是這樣。

sentences.english: They connect us even after it seems like the ties should be broken.
sentences.chinese: 即使貌似理應斷裂，仍舊藕斷絲連。

sentences.english: Safety lapses continue to plague China's coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 中國煤礦仍舊頻發安全事故。

sentences.english: Therefore, the consumption of fruit, still have to brush their teeth or mouthwash.
sentences.chinese: 故進食水果後，仍舊要刷牙或漱口。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
